answers.answer: Isnt that so exciting!!! I remember posting when I hit the double digits and someone else had posted that she only had 35 days left. I was just so jealous and at the time it seemed like it was such a loooooong way of for me. Now I am down to 37 days. And due to some complications my dr thinks it will be better to be induced so I probably don't even have that many.
37 days for me but due to very low fluid it could be early induction too!!

I am 36w2d, I am so excited. I am being induced at 39w due to gestational diabetes, so I only have 19 days left. It's so surreal. Every day is more and more surreal lol. My only concern is that I make it to full term, but that's only 5 days away. But the longer she stays in the happier ill be. But I don't wanna be induced.
So far they have no reason to induce but she has dropped and head down n tryin to make her entrance.. everyone thinks im goin early..
19 more days left for me! im soo nervous. im a ftm. I'm 37 weeks +2 days & haven't been checked for dialation or thinning yet? when do they usually start checking?
At my doctord office they start at 36 weeks bc u go every week from 36 to delivery  ill be 35+5 so she said shs would go ahead n check
hopefully they check me at my next appt this Wednesday
I dont see y not.. i mean u could always ask just for your own comfort.

question: FTM Just hit 35 weeks only 35 days and my little princess will be here!! All the pain n discomfort will deffinitly b worth it jus to see her, touch her, and hold her! Dr.Appt on the 23rd is the first pelvic exam to see if i have any dialation n cervical thinning.. Hopefully everything goes great!!
title: 35 days left
